title: Workshop on Self-Regulated Learning Design for Knowledge-Intensive Professional Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical) at post-secondary education level or higher
context.additional_context: Performance measurement through smartphone-based learning tools and project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can establish self-regulated learning plans by applying the 4Cs framework (Consuming, Creating, Connecting, Contributing)
Learners can form knowledge-sharing communities with peer experts using online collaboration tools (smartphone app-based)
Learners can complete learning design projects addressing real workplace problems and improve them through peer evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
